<div class="pilwrap" id="tailwind-merge">
  <h1>
    <a href="#tailwind-merge" name="tailwind-merge" class="pilcrow"></a>
tailwind-merge
  </h1>
</div>
<p>Utility function to efficiently merge <a href="https://tailwindcss.com">Tailwind CSS</a> classes in JS without style conflicts.</p>
<pre><code class="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { twMerge } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'tailwind-merge'</span>

twMerge(<span class="hljs-string">'px-2 py-1 bg-red hover:bg-dark-red'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'p-3 bg-[#B91C1C]'</span>)
<span class="hljs-comment">// â†’ 'hover:bg-dark-red p-3 bg-[#B91C1C]'</span>
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>Supports Tailwind v4.0 up to v4.1 (if you use Tailwind v3, use <a href="https://github.com/dcastil/tailwind-merge/tree/v2.6.0">tailwind-merge v2.6.0</a>)</li>
<li>Works in all modern browsers and maintained Node versions</li>
<li>Fully typed</li>
<li><a href="https://bundlephobia.com/package/tailwind-merge">Check bundle size on Bundlephobia</a></li>
</ul>
